name: root-cause-tracing
description: Systematically traces bugs backward through the call stack to identify the source of invalid data or incorrect behavior.
author: jduncan-rva (ported via skill-porter)

commands.name: root-cause-tracing
commands.description: Trace an error back to its original trigger.
commands.prompt: You are an expert at root cause tracing. Trace the following error back through the call stack to find its source: {{error}}
